ISSUE.TITLE: Makefile install error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: While trying to build dron, I got this error: ``` root@6f815a6b46e3:/gopath/src/github.com/drone/drone# make deps build test embed install ..... install -t /usr/local/bin debian/drone/usr/local/bin/drone install: cannot stat `debian/drone/usr/local/bin/drone': No such file or directory make: *** [install] Error 1 ``` the Makefile install seems have a wrong source dir?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: [code-886]: fix issues from bug bash (#550)
